definition: A group of individuals who participate in a specific sport that involves using hands to pass and throw a ball, typically played on a rectangular court. This term is commonly used to refer to a team of players in a popular European sport.

examples.english: The handball team won the game.

examples.german: Die Handballmannschaft trainiert hart f√ºr das Turnier.
examples.english: The handball team trains hard for the tournament.

examples.german: Die Handballmannschaft besteht aus talentierten Spielern.
examples.english: The handball team consists of talented players.

examples.german: Die Handballmannschaft spielt in der ersten Liga.
examples.english: The handball team plays in the first league.

examples.german: Die Handballmannschaft hat einen neuen Trainer.
examples.english: The handball team has a new coach.
